name: Scheduler - Marketo Bulk Upload Status Tracker
description: When there is a trigger event, do action

extended_input_schema.name: cron_expression
extended_input_schema.label: Cron expression
extended_input_schema.hint: Cron expressions are written as: [minute] [hour] [day of month] [month] [day of week]. Learn more

extended_input_schema.name: timezone
extended_input_schema.label: Timezone
extended_input_schema.hint: Select the timezone to use. Leave it blank to use (GMT-08:00) Pacific Time (US & Canada)

extended_input_schema.name: start_after
extended_input_schema.label: Start after
extended_input_schema.hint: Set date and time to start or leave blank to start immediately. Once recipe has been run or tested, value cannot be changed.

extended_input_schema.name: parameters
extended_input_schema.label: Search by
extended_input_schema.hint: Provide one or more entry fields to search the entry

block.name: declare_list
block.title: Create attachments list
block.comment: This list is responsible for storing the CSV binary data for failures and warnings, and their relevant file names

block.name: __adhoc_http_action
block.title: Track Status of the Queue
block.description: Track Status of the Queue in Marketo (Custom)

input.output: [{"control_type":"text","label":"Request ID","type":"string","name":"requestId"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Success","render_input":{},"parse_output":{},"toggle_hint":"Select from option list","toggle_field":{"label":"Success","control_type":"text","toggle_hint":"Use custom value","type":"boolean","name":"success"},"type":"boolean","name":"success"},{"name":"result","type":"array","of":"object","label":"Result","properties":[{"control_type":"number","label":"Batch ID","parse_output":"float_conversion","type":"number","name":"batchId"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Status","type":"string","name":"status"},{"control_type":"number","label":"Num of leads processed","parse_output":"float_conversion","type":"number","name":"numOfLeadsProcessed"},{"control_type":"number","label":"Num of rows failed","parse_output":"float_conversion","type":"number","name":"numOfRowsFailed"},{"control_type":"number","label":"Num of rows with warning","parse_output":"float_conversion","type":"number","name":"numOfRowsWithWarning"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Message","type":"string","name":"message"}]}]

extended_input_schema.label: Path
extended_input_schema.hint: Base URI is https://997-FKA-652.mktorest.com/rest/ - path will be appended to this URI. Use absolute URI to override this base URI.

block.name: send_mail

input.subject: Marketo Bulk upload - Failed/warning Batch details
input.body:
Tracker Job Id: #{_('data.workato.job_context.job_url')}

Please find the attachments and resolve the errors and warnings if needed.

block.comment: Email about this warnings/errors to Admin(Future scope: Upload the csv file back to the database)
